name: Outsider (Ethel Chamomile)
description:
A very short escape game made during my RPG Maker MZ 20 days trial speedrun~

I was meant to sell it to raise enough money to buy the full license for the engine but figured the game is too small and short to worth  much wwww. So here it is free to play~ I'll get the license and continue development if enough people like it.

It's an escape game where you find and use objects or solve puzzles to overcome obstacles. Think something like Monkey Island but much simpler.

The story is about someone called the Outsider who wakes up in the middle of a prison with a magic circle on the floor. It's up to you to break out and find out what happened from the environmental story telling.

The nuance is grim with dark story and desaturated coloration. Albeit lacking, I tried my best to use a rather olden, fantasy English for the literacy. 'Ere's hoping I've done good enough at it.

So there's about it! Enjoy~! n0n/

P.S.: Don't worry, it's not horror~.

You can also support me in other ways. Check out this wixsite for for details: https://ethelchamomile.wixsite.com/about

Change Log:

v1.0.1 - Fixed the box bug, fixed the equip bug, removed unneeded menus.
